description:
I've Airbnb Hosted before but this apartment is new so feel comfortable :) 
Hey there! You'll love my place because it's bright, cozy, warm for winter, and even if the subway is a block away, it's walking distance close to everything! Soho, Little Italy, Museums, Metro Lines, Art Galleries, Great bars and restaurants. It's all here! My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families! Also I’m always around should you need anything at any time!
name: Bright & Spacious, 2BR Apartment Lower East Side
review: Good location and close to the subway, the owner missing the most of the time, the shower and the smell to sewage the worst. The quality of mattress, sheets and towels very good.
